summary.span: 表示兩個 物件之間的父子關聯性。

span.span: Represents a parent/child relationship between two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用來關聯兩個物件彼此透過物件。A is used to relate two objects to each other through objects. 比方說，在客戶/訂單關聯性中，「 客戶 」 資料表是父代和 Orders 資料表是關聯性的子系。For example, in a Customer/Orders relationship, the Customers table is the parent and the Orders table is the child of the relationship. 這是類似於主索引鍵/外部索引鍵關聯性。This is similar to a primary key/foreign key relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 巡覽 Datarelation](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations.md)。For more information, see [Navigating DataRelations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations.md). 父和子資料表中的相符資料行之間建立關聯性。Relationships are created between matching columns in the parent and child tables. 也就是兩個資料行必須是相同的值。That is, the value for both columns must be identical. 關聯性也可以重疊顯示從父代的各種變更及其子資料列。Relationships can also cascade various changes from the parent to its child rows. 若要控制如何將值變更子資料列中，新增要的物件。To control how values are changed in child rows, add a to the of the object. 決定刪除或更新時要採取的值時，父資料表中的動作。The determines what action to take when a value in a parent table is deleted or updated. 當已建立，它會先確認，可以建立關聯性。When a is created, it first verifies that the relationship can be established. 它會新增至後，關聯性由不允許會破壞它的任何變更維護。After it is added to the , the relationship is maintained by disallowing any changes that would invalidate it. 之間的期間時會建立並加入至，就可能會對父或子資料列的其他變更。Between the period when a is created and added to the , it is possible for additional changes to be made to the parent or child rows. 如果這導致不再有效的關聯性，會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if this causes a relationship that is no longer valid. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個資料表之間有定義雙向關聯性，可能會發生資料損毀。Data corruption can occur if a bi-directional relation is defined between two tables. 雙向關聯性包含兩個`DataRelation`相同的資料行中，使用切換的父子式角色的物件。A bi-directional relation consists of two `DataRelation` objects that use the same columns, with the parent-child roles switched. 在引發任何例外狀況時`DataRelation`儲存物件; 不過，可能會發生資料毀損。No exception is raised when the `DataRelation` objects are saved; however, data corruption can occur. 物件包含在，您可以透過存取屬性，和並屬性。 objects are contained in a , which you can access through the property of the , and the and properties of the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立新並將它加入的。The following example creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型是安全多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何使用這個建構函式所建立的物件必須新增至集合方法內和區塊。Any object created by using this constructor must be added to the collection with the method inside of a and block. 如果這個建構函式未呼叫之間並就會發生。If this constructor is not called between and a will occur. 此外，資料表和資料行具有指定的名稱必須存在於的呼叫建構函式時。In addition, the tables and columns with the specified names must exist at the time the constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有相關聯存在此關聯性，它會自動建立，並指向`ChildKeyConstraint`、 關聯性加入至關聯的集合時。If no associated exists for this relationship, it will be created automatically, and pointed to by the `ChildKeyConstraint`, when the relation is added to the collection of relations. ## Examples 下列範例會設定`UpdateRule`， `DeleteRule`，並`AcceptReject`規則`ForeignKeyConstraint`相關聯`DataRelation`。The following example sets the `UpdateRule`, `DeleteRule`, and `AcceptReject` rule for the `ForeignKeyConstraint` associated with the `DataRelation`. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelation.ChildKeyConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation.ChildKeyConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來定義階層式關聯性，例如 XML 中指定的物件。You can use objects to define hierarchical relationships, such as those specified in XML. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 巢狀 Datarelation](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations.md)。For more information, see [Nesting DataRelations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果關聯性中的子資料表的比對之間的關係，父資料表中的資料行屬性必須為 false。If the of the child table in the relation matches the of a column in the parent table in the relation, the property must be false. 這不是.NET Framework 1.0 版的必要項目。This was not required with the .NET Framework version 1.0.
